# gamefabric_service_account_password (Ephemeral Resource)

Ephemeral resource for retrieving a service account password. The password is reset when the ephemeral resource is opened and is only available during the Terraform operation.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `service_account` (String) The name of the service account.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `password` (String, Sensitive) The password for the service account (reset on each use).
